--- title: "" include-after-body: text: | --- :::::: {.scenario .column-screen} :::: {.column-body .scenario-text} ## The Christmas Market :::: ::: {.column-body .scenario-image} ![](images/market.png) ::: :::: {.column-body .scenario-text} As Hannah and Meghan entered the market, their eyes sparkled with excitement. The first thing they saw was a dazzling chocolate stall, where the air was filled with the sweet aroma of warm, melted chocolate. Chocolate Santas, snowmen, and reindeer tempted the sisters with their deliciously festive smells. Further down the glittering path, Hannah and Meghan spied a mysterious tent, where a wise old fortune-teller sat surrounded by twinkling fairy lights. The tent seemed to glow with magical energy. :::: :::: {.column-body .scenario-image} ::: {style="text-align: center;"} ### What will you choose? ::: ```{=html}
Go back
The chocolate stall
The fortune teller
``` :::: ::::::
